pr_title: Make sure that aliased literals are not de-duplicated

timeline.message:
Make sure that aliased literals are not de-duplicated

Fixes https://github.com/crate/crate/issues/9732

This is already fixed in master by https://github.com/crate/crate/pull/9684

timeline.bodyText: Without the fix there was an eval on top that had mes, mes, mes
timeline.author: mfussenegger
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -338,6 +339,57 @@ public void testAliasedPrimaryKeyLookupHasGetPlan() {
                                 "Get[doc.users | name | DocKeys{1}"));
     }
 
+    @Test
+    public void test_literal_with_alias_are_not_de_duplicated() {
+        LogicalPlan plan = plan(
+            "SELECT\n" +
+            "        id_asset,\n" +
+            "        sum(hora),\n" +
+            "        sum(dia),\n" +
+            "        SUM(mes)\n" +
+            "    FROM (\n" +
+            "        SELECT\n" +
+            "            id_asset,\n" +
+            "            sum(fields['contador_total:dx']) AS hora,\n" +
+            "            0 AS dia,\n" +
+            "            0 as mes\n" +
+            "        FROM\n" +
+            "            zmx.metrics\n" +
+            "        GROUP BY\n" +
+            "            id_asset\n" +
+            "        UNION ALL\n" +
+            "        SELECT\n" +
+            "            id_asset,\n" +
+            "            0 AS hora,\n" +
+            "            sum(fields['contador_total:dx']) AS dia,\n" +
+            "            0 as mes\n" +
+            "        FROM\n" +
+            "            zmx.metrics\n" +
+            "        GROUP BY\n" +
+            "            id_asset\n" +
+            "        ) AS subquery\n" +
+            "    GROUP BY\n" +
+            "        id_asset limit 100;"
+        );
+        assertThat(
+            plan,
+            isPlan(
+                "Limit[100;0]\n" +
+                "GroupBy[id_asset | sum(hora), sum(dia), sum(mes)]\n" +

timeline.message:
Make sure that aliased literals are not de-duplicated

Fixes https://github.com/crate/crate/issues/9732

This is already fixed in master by https://github.com/crate/crate/pull/9684
